type.description: Delete existing content in a textbox and then type content.

scroll.description: Scroll up or down. Multiple scrolls are allowed to browse the webpage. Pay attention!! The default scroll is the whole window. If the scroll widget is located in a certain area of the webpage, then you have to specify a Web Element in that area. I would hover the mouse there and then scroll.

wait.description: Wait. Typically used to wait for unfinished webpage processes, with a duration of 5 seconds.

goback.description: Go back, returning to the previous webpage.

google.description: Google, directly jump to the Google search page. When you can't find information in some websites, try starting over with Google.

answer.description: Answer. This action should only be chosen when all questions in the task have been solved.
